comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Ciprian Ioan Deac (CFR Cluj) alters the score to 0:1. He jumps highest near the penalty spot to meet a good cross from Billel Omrani and steers a header in off the right post. Scott Bain was helpless.

comments.comments_text: Mario Rondon (CFR Cluj) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Andris Treimanis didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
